title: SET_MINIMAP_OVERLAY_DISPLAY
content:
0x6A48B3CA// SetMinimapOverlayDisplay
void SET_MINIMAP_OVERLAY_DISPLAY(int miniMap, float x, float y, float xScale, float yScale, float alpha);Parameters:miniMap: The minimap overlay ID.x: The X position for the overlay. This is equivalent to a game coordinate X.y: The Y position for the overlay. This is equivalent to a game coordinate Y, except that it's inverted (gfxY = -gameY).xScale: The X scale for the overlay. This is equivalent to the Flash _xscale property, therefore 100 = 100%.yScale: The Y scale for the overlay. This is equivalent to the Flash _yscale property.alpha: The alpha value for the overlay. This is equivalent to the Flash _alpha property, therefore 100 = 100%.Sets the display info for a minimap overlay.
codeBlocks:
// SetMinimapOverlayDisplay
void SET_MINIMAP_OVERLAY_DISPLAY(int miniMap, float x, float y, float xScale, float yScale, float alpha);
